# Path expressions for Fs
# 2018-02-21, Georg Fischer
# Path expressions are built with 2 operations:
# "/X"    - reverse the sequence of elements in X
# "X.n+m" - insert digit m after the digit for 5^n in each element of X
# Examples: [].0+1 = [1]; [12].0+3 = [123]; [12].2+3 = [312]; [1234].1+0 = [12304];
#
# Width n starts with the path expressions An, Bn, Cn:
# A98 = [/A97.0+3,A97.0+2,/A97.0+1]; (n even)
# A99 = [/A98.0+1,A98.0+2,/A98.0+3]; (n odd)
# B98 = [ A97.0+4,A98    , A97.0+0]; (n even)
# B99 = [ A98.0+0,A99    , A98.0+4]; (n odd)
# C98 = [ B97.1+0,B98    , B97.1+4]; (n even)
# C99 = [ B98.1+4,B99    , B98.1+0]; (n odd)
#---------------------------------
A0 = [];
#----
A1 = [/A0.0+1,A0.0+2,/A0.0+3]
   = [1 ,2 ,3]
B1 = [A0.0+0,A1,A0.0+4]
   = [0 ,1,2,3 ,4]
#--------
A2 = [/A1.0+3,A1.0+2,/A1.0+1]
   = [33,23,13 
     ,12,22,32 
     ,31,21,11];
B2 = [A1.0+4,A2,A1.0+0]
   = [14,24,34
     ,33,23,13 ,12,22,32 ,31,21,11
     ,10,20,30];
C2 = [B1.1+0,B2,B1.1+4]
   = [00,01,02,03,04
     ,14,24,34 ,33,23,13,12,22,32,31,21,11 ,10,20,30
     ,40,41,42,43,44];
#--------
A3 = [/A2.0+1,A2.0+2,/A2.0+3]
   = [111,211,311,321,221,121,131,231,331
     ,332,232,132,122,222,322,312,212,112
     ,113,213,313,323,223,123,133,233,333];
B3 = [A2.0+0,A3,A2.0+4]
   = [330,230,130,120,220,320,310,210,110
     ,111,211,311,321,221,121,131,231,331
     ,332,232,132,122,222,322,312,212,112
     ,113,213,313,323,223,123,133,233,333
     ,334,234,134,124,224,324,314,214,114];
C3 = [B2.1+4,B3,B2.1+0]
   = [144,244,344,343,243,143,142,242,342,341,241,141,140,240,340
     ,330,230,130,120,220,320,310,210,110
     ,111,211,311,321,221,121,131,231,331
     ,332,232,132,122,222,322,312,212,112
     ,113,213,313,323,223,123,133,233,333
     ,334,234,134,124,224,324,314,214,114
     ,104,204,304,303,203,103,102,202,302,301,201,101,100,200,300];
D3 = [C2.2+0,C3,C2.2+4]
   = [000,001,002,003,004
     ,014,024,034 ,033,023,013,012,022,032,031,021,011 ,010,020,030
     ,040,041,042,043,044
     
     ,144,244,344,343,243,143,142,242,342,341,241,141,140,240,340
     ,330,230,130,120,220,320,310,210,110
     ,111,211,311,321,221,121,131,231,331
     ,332,232,132,122,222,322,312,212,112
     ,113,213,313,323,223,123,133,233,333
     ,334,234,134,124,224,324,314,214,114
     ,104,204,304,303,203,103,102,202,302,301,201,101,100,200,300
     
     ,400,401,402,403,404
     ,414,424,434,433,423,413,412,422,432,431,421,411,410,420,430
     ,440,441,442,443,444];
#--------
